mapper.select: SELECT t1.open_id, t1.nickname, t1.head_img_url, t1.sex_desc, t1.country, t1.province, t1.city, t2.name, t2.content, t2.rank, t2.score FROM wx_gzh_user t1 LEFT JOIN wx_gzh_fenwei_tag t2 ON t1.gzh_id = t2.gzh_id AND t1.open_id = t2.open_id WHERE t1.create_by = t2.create_by AND t1.create_by = #{createBy} AND t1.gzh_id = #{gzhId} AND t2.field_id = #{fieldId}

SELECT t1.id, t1.gzh_id AS gzhId, t1.open_id AS openId, t1.nickname, t3.`name` AS fenWeiTags, t3.wx_tag_id AS tagIds FROM wx_gzh_user t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.open_id, count( t.open_id ) AS openid_count, t.tag_id, t.compute, t.flag, SUM( t.flag ) AS flag_sum FROM ( SELECT t1.open_id, t2.tag_id, t2.rid, t1.content, t2.compute, t1.score AS score1, t2.score AS score2, CASE t2.compute WHEN 'gt' THEN t1.score >= t2.score ELSE t1.score <= t2.score END flag FROM ( SELECT t1.open_id, t1.`name` AS rid, t1.content, t1.score FROM wx_gzh_fenwei_tag t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.open_id, count( t1.open_id ) FROM wx_gzh_fenwei_tag t1 LEFT JOIN wx_gzh_tag_rule t2 ON t1.`name` = t2.rid WHERE t1.create_by = #{userId} AND t1.gzh_id = #{gzhId} AND t2.tag_id = #{tagId} GROUP BY t1.open_id HAVING count( t1.open_id ) = #{size} ) t2 ON t1.open_id = t2.open_id WHERE t1.create_by = #{userId} AND t1.gzh_id = #{gzhId} ) t1 LEFT JOIN wx_gzh_tag_rule t2 ON t1.rid = t2.rid WHERE t2.tag_id = #{tagId} ORDER BY t1.open_id ) t GROUP BY t.open_id HAVING count( t.open_id ) = SUM( t.flag ) ) t2 ON t1.open_id = t2.open_id LEFT JOIN wx_gzh_tag t3 ON t2.tag_id = t3.id WHERE t1.create_by = #{userId} AND t1.gzh_id = #{gzhId} AND t2.tag_id = #{tagId}
SELECT `name` as value, field_id as fieldId, content as label FROM wx_gzh_fenwei_tag GROUP BY `name`,field_id,content ORDER BY field_id
